episodes.title: 1982 CW Scientology Hearings - Scientology's Response - Day 5
episodes.description:
Attorney Paul Johnson appears for the church.  One week earlier, he had demanded to be allowed to speak. Once he had his chance, he refused to respond to any of the charges leveled in the hearings.

Playlist of Full Hearings: 
http://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLB8A8C6C0BFB607D1

episodes.title: 1982 CW Scientology Hearings - Paulette Cooper - Day 4
episodes.description:
Paulette Cooper, author of "The Scandal of Scientology" testifies about the covert operations Scientology used against her to try to ruin her life.

Playlist of Full Hearings: 
http://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLB8A8C6C0BFB607D1

episodes.title: 1982 CW Scientology Hearings - Documents Entered - Day 3
episodes.description:
Attorney Michael Flynn enters Scientology documents into the record.

Playlist of Full Hearings: 
http://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLB8A8C6C0BFB607D1

episodes.title: 1982 CW Scientology Hearings - Brown McKee Testimony - Day 4
episodes.description:
Brown McKee had spent 24 years in Scientology by the time of these hearings.  He was a mission holder in Connecticut and was present at the infamous 1982 meeting in which mission holders were strong-armed into accepting new terms...or else.

Playlist of Full Hearings: 
http://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLB8A8C6C0BFB607D1

episodes.title: 1982 CW Scientology Hearings - Opening Statements - Day 1
episodes.description:
The hearings begin with an opening statement from attorney Michael Flynn.  Drama is added to the moment as Scientology's Attorney Paul Johnson rises in the auditorium, demanding to be heard.

Playlist of Full Hearings: 
http://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLB8A8C6C0BFB607D1

episodes.title: 1982 CW Scientology Hearings - Edward Walter 2/2 - Day 1
episodes.description:
The second half of Edward Walter's testimony.

Playlist of Full Hearings: 
http://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLB8A8C6C0BFB607D1

episodes.title: 1982 CW Scientology Hearings - Ron DeWolf - Day 1
episodes.description:
Ron DeWolf (L. Ron Hubbard Jr.) was the son of Hubbard and worked very closely with his father during the growth of Scientology in the 1950's.  He had a very rocky relationship with his dad and ultimately wound up testifying against him in court.

Playlist of Full Hearings: 
http://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLB8A8C6C0BFB607D1

episodes.title: 1982 CW Scientology Hearings - Ron DeWolf - Day 2
episodes.description:
Ron DeWolf (L. Ron Hubbard Jr.) was the son of Hubbard and worked very closely with his father during the growth of Scientology in the 1950's.  He had a very rocky relationship with his dad and ultimately wound up testifying against him in court.

Playlist of Full Hearings: 
http://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLB8A8C6C0BFB607D1

episodes.title: 1982 CW Scientology Hearings - Casey Kelly - Day 3
episodes.description:
During the three years, Kelly spent at FLAG, he handled Scientology's finances and recruitment.

Playlist of Full Hearings: 
http://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLB8A8C6C0BFB607D1

episodes.title: 1982 CW Scientology Hearings - Rosie Pace - Day 3
episodes.description:
Rosie is the sister of Lori Taverna.  She spent eight months at FLAG and tells about her experiences in Clearwater.

Playlist of Full Hearings: 
http://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLB8A8C6C0BFB607D1

episodes.title: 1982 CW Scientology Hearings - David Ray - Day 3
episodes.description:
David gives a blow by blow account of what is was like to join the Sea Org and discover the harsh realities of life among the "elite crew" of Scientology.

Playlist of Full Hearings: 
http://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLB8A8C6C0BFB607D1

episodes.title: 1982 CW Scientology Hearings - George Meister - Day 3
episodes.description:
George Meister was told his daughter Susan committed suicide while a member of the Sea Org onboard the ship, The Apollo. When the grieving father asked questions, he was shocked by Scientology's actions.

Playlist of Full Hearings: 
http://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLB8A8C6C0BFB607D1

episodes.title: 1982 CW Scientology Hearings - Robert Dardino - Day 4
episodes.description:
Robert burgled medical and legal offices on the orders on Scientology.

Playlist of Full Hearings: 
http://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLB8A8C6C0BFB607D1

episodes.title: 1982 CW Scientology Hearings - Dr. John Clark - Day 4
episodes.description:
A Harvard professor, Dr. Clark was a major target for Scientology as he was a respected psychiatrist speaking out about the destructive nature of cults.  Scientology set out to destroy him with lawsuits, slander and dirty tricks.

Playlist of Full Hearings: 
http://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLB8A8C6C0BFB607D1

episodes.title: 1982 CW Scientology Hearings - Closing Argument 1/2 - Day 5
episodes.description:
Attorney Michaal Flynn sums up what has been entered in the course of the hearings.

Playlist of Full Hearings: 
http://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLB8A8C6C0BFB607D1

episodes.title: 1982 CW Scientology Hearings - Closing Arguments 2/2 - Day5
episodes.description:
Attorney Michael Flynn sums up what has been presented to the City Commission in this final video of the series.

Playlist of Full Hearings: 
http://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLB8A8C6C0BFB607D1

episodes.title: 1982 CW Scientology Hearings - Lori Taverna -Day 2
episodes.description:
Lori Tells the council about the many abuses she witnessed in Scientology including medical neglect of staff members and their children.

Playlist of Full Hearings: 
http://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLB8A8C6C0BFB607D1

episodes.title: 1982 CW Scientology Hearings - Casey Kelly - Day 2
episodes.description:
During the years Kelly spent in Scientology, he handled their finances and recruitment.  This is the first part of his testimony.  He returned to finish the following morning.

Playlist of Full Hearings: 
http://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLB8A8C6C0BFB607D1

episodes.title: 1982 CW Scientology Hearings - Ernest and Adelle Hartwell - Day 3
episodes.description:
The Hartwells were not Scientologists yet they wound up working alongside L. Ron Hubbard at Golden Era Studios.  They were witness to the insanity that came with the Sea Org but without the indoctrination. 

Playlist of Full Hearings: 
http://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLB8A8C6C0BFB607D1

These two ballroom dancers thought they were coming to Clearwater to be with their daughter but instead found themselves in a hidden, desert compound.

episodes.title: 1982 CW Scientology Hearings - Lavenda Van Schaick - Day 4
episodes.description:
Lavenda Van Schaick testifies about the living conditions of children and contends that hepatitis swept through the Clearwater base in 1977.

Playlist of Full Hearings: 
http://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLB8A8C6C0BFB607D1

episodes.title: 1982 CW Scientology Hearings - Janie Peterson - Day 4
episodes.description:
Janie was a member of the Guardian's Office.  She explains how community programs such as Narconon and Applied Scholastics are really PR tools.

Playlist of Full Hearings: 
http://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLB8A8C6C0BFB607D1

episodes.title: 1982 CW Scientology Hearings - Sharon McKee - Day 4
episodes.description:
Sharon worked in Michael Flynn's law office and testifies briefly about unusual activities at the Flynn office.

Playlist of Full Hearings: 
http://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLB8A8C6C0BFB607D1

episodes.title: 1982 CW Scientology Hearings - Scott Mayer 1/2 - Day 4
episodes.description:
Scott talks about why Hubbard decided to settle in Clearwater and what actions the group took to take over the city.

episodes.title: 1982 CW Scientology Hearings - Edward Walter 1/2 - Day 1
episodes.description:
As the first witness, Walters covers a lot of ground, giving an overview of the corruption that the city council will hear about for several days.
